Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 36th overall pick, by Baltimore in 1967...
Injured on 5/30/1968 with a Tight Elbow, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 4/14/1971...
Was selected to the 1973 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1976 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1977 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/1979, winning 2 games with a 0.53 ERA...
Traded from Baltimore to Los Angeles on 4/1/1980 (Going to LA: P D. Tidrow. Going to BAL: P D. Palmer)...
Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1982, winning 2 games with a 1.59 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/1982, going 6-1, 1.27...
